meth



Ltd Ed 'Solve et Elucido' Art Giclee

This reverberating psychedelic giclee print is a gift for a $500 donation to Erowid. 12" x 12", stretched on canvas, the image wraps around the sides of the 1" thick piece. Signed by artist Vibrata, and Erowid founders Earth & Fire.

General

It is located near the footer of the site, following the main content and resource navigation.
